altername_name: Final Fantasy: The Four Heroes of Light
Hikari no 4 Senshi: Final Fantasy Gaiden
最终幻想外传: 光之四战士
name: Final Fantasy: The 4 Heroes of Light
overview: With Final Fantasy: The 4 Heroes of Light, the Final Fantasy series is rendered anew as an epic storybook adventure by the creators of the Final Fantasy III and Final Fantasy IV Nintendo DS remakes. Players will enter a beautiful fairy-tale world featuring illustrations and character designs by acclaimed character designer Akihiko Yoshida (Final Fantasy III for DS, Final Fantasy XII).
